content: couldn t decide whether to call these hug boots or h ugg boots they do look a little like ugg boots don t they really happy with these sweet little bootees - great unisex pattern dk 8ply yarn 3 75mm needles newborn - length of sole 3 ½ 9cm 3months - length of sole 4 10cm preemie sizes also added only requires 17g of yarn so quick and easy to knit these would be a great little baby shower gift so cute **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓** version 1 ~ https //mariannaslazydaisydays blogspot com/2016/04/baby-hug-boots html version 2 ~ https //mariannaslazydaisydays blogspot com/2023/08/baby-hug-boots-version-2 html
